}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is assumed (it is almost certain..) to be an [[Edimax EW-7822UAC]]. :The USB ID for the device is taken from the '''Realtek''' vendor driver set for the 8812au. The OEM is stated as '''Edimax''' in the driver.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.sitecom.com/lu/persbericht-detail/231/2625 '''''Sitecom releases 802.11ac product range''''' - '''Sitecom''' press release from June 2013]
